body: @FilipGrebowski Can you confirm this is still reproducible? I'm seeing no issues on the latest version of Chrome (71.0.3578.80) running on macOS Mojave.

Fixed. Chrome's security policies were messin' with us. Have forced https for all traffic on the domain which seems to have fixed the issue.
